metadata.title: CVE-2024-56653 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: btmtk: avoid UAF in btmtk_process_coredumphci_devcd_append may lead to the release of the skb, so it cannot beaccessed once it is called.==================================================================BUG: KASAN: slab-use-after-free in btmtk_process_coredump+0x2a7/0x2d0[btmtk]Read of size 4 at addr
